name: Price of Resurrection
description:
Warning! This game is rated T for Violence, Blood and scary Imagery!

Abstract
Done for the IGMC 2022, this game is an unique spin on the revival formula with a girl who has powers to kill you in her sleep.

Plot
Hasumi, a young girl like any other suffers from sleepwalking. It seems that she does things every now and then without meaning to. However, due to a horrific accident that befalls on her sister, Hasumi learns that she is able to kill people in her sleep. Only by mastering her powers of affecting the physical world in her dreams, may she be able to attempt to resurrect her sister...

Features
* You can spare all your foes; talk to them and hear them beg you to spare them or spare no one and do a complete genocide
* Multiple endings to achieve, the game's plot is determined by your actions
* Explore various dreams which change based on your actions
